name: Diggy Diggy Dwarf
description: Diggy Diggy Dwarf is a game about honor, redemption and... digging. You will take on the role of Bill, a dwarf who has been exiled from his home town for his mischievous and despicable behavior. If he wants to get back home, he needs to find a way to regain his honor but the only thing he knows is, well... digging. See if you can dig deep enough in this treasure hunting game to find out if Bill has got what it takes to find the honor he lost. Better start digging!
